entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
